name: eProcess Solutions
tag_list: enterprise, management, concepts, processes, organization, information, technology, business, government, optimum, utilization, efficiency, identify, develop, implement, operations, change, guidance, evaluations, studies, analyses, compliance, alignments,
overview:
eProcess Solutions is a management and technology consulting firm founded in 1997 to help business and government enterprises achieve optimum utilization and efficiency. Our mission is to help you solve your toughest problems in strategy, operations, and change — co-evolution of concepts, processes, organization, and information technology.

From emergence to maturity, eProcess Solutions leverages our unique perspective as industry pioneers to identify, develop and implement smart strategies and tactics for your organization. From development plans to implementation, advanced application design to consultation, we assist you in reducing costs, streamlining administration, adding efficiencies and shortening your time to market. eProcess Solutions has a proven track record in providing guidance in support of organizations’ evaluations, studies, analyses, compliance/alignments, and business reporting.

eProcess Solutions is committed to delivering results that meet your expectations.

Below synopsis of what eProcess Solutions can do for your organization:

Supporting your analysis, validation and information visualization activities Imparting to your organization industry best practices for improvement of your existing operations. Assist in translating business requirements and models into feasible and acceptable designs Transferring the expertise in rationalizing and normalizing processes in support of the development of automated information systems and business transformation Bringing experience in performing strategic assessments of the utility of systems, processes, policies, cost and directives using a structured approach to evaluate options, process solutions, and recommending the most effective course of action to meet the business objectives Conveying the know-how on reducing and eliminating duplicative data capture and system access activities and automating manual processes. Providing to your organization the skills in identifying standard data requirements, managing authoritative data sources, extracting relevant business rules, developing standard interfaces, and implementing your enterprise-wide solutions. Propagate within your organization the practice of leveraging best practices across your enterprise initiatives and develop rapid adoption techniques for information process standards. Jointly perform technology assessments and analysis of existing and proposed business system solutions; addressing requirements traceability, impacts of business process re-engineering, impacts to existing and proposed systems, identifying challenges between new or existing components, solving integration issues and making recommendations for problem resolution as needed to ensure compatibility. Sharing with your team our experience in creating organizational and governance structures. Assist in executing a methodology that enables the identification and validation of capability gaps/problems, development of solution analysis Supporting of your existing business processes and capabilities
